title: Episode 35 - Apollonia Poilâne
itunes:title: Episode 35 - Apollonia Poilâne
description: This week we fly to Paris and enter the Poilâne bakehouse with Apollonia Poilâne. She not only leads this legendary bakery but also has a new MasterClass 'Apollonia Poilâne Teaches Bread Baking' And we get a Quick Bite with the great actor and food lover Greg Grunberg.
content:encoded: This week we fly to Paris and enter the Poilâne bakehouse with Apollonia Poilâne. She not only leads this legendary bakery but also has a new MasterClass 'Apollonia Poilâne Teaches Bread Baking' And we get a Quick Bite with the great actor and food lover Greg Grunberg.
itunes:keywords: apollonia poilane, Paris, bread maker, Comedy, breaking bread, cooking, FOOD, family, feast, bread, PODCAST, Tom Papa
itunes:author: All Things Comedy
